Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/103rd
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Torrence, 100th and Commercial : due to, street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Torrence, 100th, Commercial and over regular route, due to street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/South Shore
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted near 67th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stoney Island, 67th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 67th/South Shore.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to a Cubs game near Clark/Addison.

#22 Clark buses will operate via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to a Cubs game near Clark/Addison.

#152 Addison buses will operate via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at 71st/St Lawrence
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted near 71st/St Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, South Chicago, Keefe, 69th, King Dr, 71st, and resume normal route: due to, street blockage near 71st/St Lawrence.

Allow extra travel time.
